website_summaries.verdict: With its vibrant neon colors, wonky human smile, and the ability to both bounce and float, Grinz is an interactive treat ball that is sure to keep you and your dog entertained.
pros: Ball sports a hole for hiding treats
Best for small to medium sized dogs
cons: Can’t select the color you want online

customer_reviews.title: FUNNY AS....:-)
customer_reviews.text: I seen these on here and just had to LAUGH at the ball myself so I ordered one for my Boston Bull Terrier. She seems to LOVE IT! The only CON about this ball so FAR is that it's just like any other ball meaning in order for the Grin to show the dog has to pick it up the correct way. I had NO CLUE that this ball was Rubber and it does seem pretty tough. So we will see it also floats and can put treats in this ball. I also own the Green one!
customer_reviews.author: LoyalOne

customer_reviews.title: Your Dog Will Love It, Hate You
customer_reviews.text: Great, unique toy that is surprisingly durable. I have a Vizsla who destroys pretty much any toy besides the black Kong toys and the Rogz Grinz has held up like the Kongs. Ball is great for a few laughs at the expense of your dogs dignity, too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Fun not just for the dogs
customer_reviews.text: This toy is surprisingly durable for a dog that likes to squeeze and not tear at their balls. Its fun because of the anticipation that the pup will pick it up in just the right way and you'll get to have that priceless moment is far more entertaining than simply not having that potential for hilarious cuteness!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Brink

customer_reviews.title: dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: the dogs love these balls and were a good size whether my large dog or poodle is playing with it I got several of them one for each dog in there own color so I know which one go's to which dog and these balls are very durable with out being hard the dog have been unable to tear them up even when chowing on them to get the treat out
customer_reviews.author: momstoys

customer_reviews.title: Fun but difficult for the dog to bite it correctly
customer_reviews.text: its kinda big for my maltese, but my shnauzher (?) could easily play, but they wont just "smile" 4 u, they play like a regular ball... so if u want a picture, u are going to have to grab them, since they just bite anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Will be ordering more
customer_reviews.text: I will be ordering more of these. The giant toothy grin is a bonus. All five of my dogs have had a chance at this ball and it is holding up, still looks new, and that is saying a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie J.

customer_reviews.title: NOT dogo or pit bull proof
customer_reviews.text: loved the concept of this but if you have a chewer, don't order this ball. my pit bull puppy had this in pieces in the dining room within 20 minutes. but if you don't have a chewer, it should be fine!
customer_reviews.author: notatourist

customer_reviews.title: Dogs will love this ball
customer_reviews.text: Between myself and my grown up children we have six dogs, 2 huskies, 2 labs and 2 terriers, we went on the field with the ball which is brilliant as they are visible to see on the grass. After a while of laughter to see which dog had the ball the correct way, we all were in stitches laughing. At home we added the treats and the dogs are very clever bagging it against the wall to retrieve the treat. DOGS will love this and the owners. Good presents
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Jacqueline Moxham

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great picture
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love to play with this ball, it has a hole in the back so it makes it hard to get them to hold it still to take a good picture but if you get one it's great
customer_reviews.author: MQOH

customer_reviews.title: Great longlasting toy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these for resale over Chirstmas but this one was for my own dog, the toy destroyer! Still have it, he loves it. It is strong and durable. Love the hidey hole for treats to make it even better than just a ball. The resale ones just flew off the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: bc lover

customer_reviews.title: Fun to look at !
customer_reviews.text: These toys are loved by the dogs and funny to look at when they are in the dogs mouth! When you get them keep the camera handy!
customer_reviews.author: L. Joerg

customer_reviews.title: Fun and useful toy
customer_reviews.text: Head turner at the parks for both my dog and me ;) Great toy. Could be a little more solid, but we'll see how long it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Dog loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Puppy dog loved it. Now, if I can ONLY get a picture of him looking at me while it's in his mouth!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Crist

customer_reviews.title: Dog loved it and it makes you laugh hilariously to see the ball in their mouth!  Great texture too!
customer_reviews.text: The big toothed smile on the ball truly looks soooo funny in your dogs mouth! My dog loves the texture of the ball too - easy to play with and bounces well too! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne R. Berchin

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: Great, my dog loved it! It was just like it was described. It came in the alloted time that was specified
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Dog ball
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my brothers little dog I thought it might be to big and not look right or funny ... but it did and better yet his dog loved the ball
customer_reviews.author: laura woodman

customer_reviews.title: I put a 'smile' on several dog's faces!
customer_reviews.text: Every dog loves a ball to play with. This ball is also very durable, even for the active chewer. The best thing about this product is the 'entertainment' it gives to the humans. Many opportunities for Kodak moments.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Kirby

customer_reviews.title: bounces well and my dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: It is durable and cannot be chewed up or torn. It is easy to find in the bushes and lots of fun!! Carolyn
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Balls strength
customer_reviews.text: They really should of included the strongest of the ball. My dog did not play with it cause the rubber was to tough. It could almost knock the poor guy out. So I just gave it to the neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: ajmathews18

customer_reviews.title: Great Novalty
customer_reviews.text: These balls are a great novalty, but not chew proof. They don't pass the Lab test. I have a labrador, she was able to get her teeth into the hole and rip it apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Lyng

product_meta.title: Rogz Fun Dog Treat Ball in various sizes and colors, Medium, Blue
product_meta.description: Not just a treat ball, Grinz is the funniest dog ball on the market! With it's unique smile, this ball bounces and floats so a physically fit game of fetch is most certain to occur. With the added treat feature, Grinz not only encourages physically active dogs but stimulates mentally sharp ones too! Simply put the treats in the back of the ball and let your pooch dive in. The tiny suction prevention hole in the front of the ball ensures that your dog's tongue won't get stuck trying to lick out those treats because safety is always first with Rogz! Available in 3 sizes and 5 colors, Grinz is the perfect, all-purpose toy for your dog.
feature_bullets: A fun pet ball in various colors to keep your dog mentally and physically stimulated
Fill the ball with your dog`s favorite treats or food for a fast Treat Dispenser
Ideal for Small to Medium sized dogs (size specific)
Grinz bounce too so triple up as a standard throw-and-fetch ball toy!
